Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds significant value to me, but recognizing its worth to you is paramount. I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to provide you with an exceptional value while ensuring a profitable transaction for me. I believe this price reflects the quality and utility of the product, and I'm confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
